title: LFT Silver 3 ADC/JG main
body:
Hey I am looking for a team to join as the ADC or Jungle. I have good stats on my champions
and in S4/S5 the champions that I played were {{champion:18}} {{champion:42}} {{champion:236}} {{champion:104}} at ADC and I also played often {{champion:62}} {{champion:107}} JG.

Contact: Skype, Curse Voice
IGN: Dumbledore - http://www.lolking.net/summoner/oce/922319#profile
Message me if interested.

replies.body: silverish team looking for an adc who is on consistantly (dailyish) just add axxjazz and send me a message
